jobs.title: Founding Firmware Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
👋 Hi, I’m Nik. I’m looking for a world-class founding firmware engineer to build Omi with me.

  • Omi is AI for your real life.

  • Think: wearable memory, voice-first interface, the reverse iPhone.

  • In the past 10 months, we’ve:

    • Grown to 300K software users

    • Hit 100M+ organic video views

    • Built 3 working hardware devices

Now I’m ready to go deeper — and I need you.

About Me

  • 26 y.o.

  • 🇷🇺 Born on an island in the Pacific (Russia), now in SF

  • 🧠 Thiel Fellow

  • 💰 Sold 2 startups — scaled the last to $4M ARR, $3M raised, acquired by Toptal

  • 💻 Built the first Omi prototypes (hardware, mobile)

  • 💸 Raised $7M+ total

  • 🧲 Managed teams across 3 continents

  • 📈 Drove 100M+ organic impressions for Omi

Check me out at nikshevchenko.com

What You’ll Do

As the first firmware engineer, you’ll:

  • Own firmware for omi devices

  • Hack other devices to integrate them with omi ecosystem (i.e. apple watch, meta glasses, etc...)

  • Help shape product direction, technical stack, and even culture

  • Work directly with me every day — we’ll build and launch together

This is not a “here’s what to do” job — this is “what should we do next?”

What I’m Looking For

Someone who’s built and shipped something impressive. For example:

  • Wrote firmware for 1k+ devices

  • Or Built a product used by 1M+ people

  • Or built something with >$1M revenue

  • Or raised >$1M as a founder / solo builder

  • Or deeply technical + insanely fast — even if early in your journey

You don’t need to check every box — but one really strong signal is enough.

Tech Stack (so far)

  • Flutter (might move to React soon)

  • Python / Flask

  • Firmware: C, Nordic chips

  • BLE

Why This Might Be the One

  • You’ll get lots of equity and full ownership over technical direction

  • Work on actual AI hardware, not just apps

  • Build something that people already love — and want more of

  • Help people think and live better with ambient, embodied AI

Let’s make humans 1000x smarter with AI by 2026.
Let’s make robots help in every apartment by 2028.
Let's create the metaverse

II personally check every candidate!
If I didn’t respond, something was off. 🥲

jobs.title: Community Lead
jobs.descriptionHtml:
👋 Hi, I’m Nik — founder of Omi

Omi is AI for your real life.
Think: wearable memory, voice-first interface, the reverse iPhone.

We’ve built a community of 9k people in Discord, shipped devices, and hit 100M+ organic views.
Now it’s time to scale our community — fast.

Your job is simple — make Omi the most visible hardware brand in the world.

You’ll:

  • Build and lead an Ambassador Program (10 core ambassadors, 100+ creators)

  • Generate 100+ events per year (mostly hackathons)

  • Drive 100+ YouTube videos annually featuring Omi products and apps

  • Make Omi show up everywhere — online and IRL

Who You Are

You’ve already done this before.
Specifically:

  • Built or managed a team of 10+ people

  • Organized large-scale events (ideally tech, hardware, or creator focused)

  • Can send me proof — links to events, campaigns, or communities you’ve built

  • You move fast, think bigger than anyone else in the room, and know how to rally people

If you haven’t led before or can’t show proof of execution — this role is not for you.

Why Join Omi

  • Real product. Real users. 100M+ organic views and counting

  • Hardware + AI — not vaporware, but something people wear every day

  • You’ll define what “community” means for a brand that’s already viral

  • Direct access to me — zero bureaucracy, full ownership

We’re building something that people already love — and you’ll make the world love it louder.
If you’ve ever thought, “I could build a global movement,”
this is your shot.

jobs.title: Founding Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
👋 Hi, I’m Nik. I’m looking for a world-class founding engineer to build Omi with me.

  • Omi is AI for your real life.

  • Think: wearable memory, voice-first interface, the reverse iPhone.

  • In the past 10 months, we’ve:

    • Grown to 300K software users

    • Hit 100M+ organic video views

    • Built 3 working hardware devices

Now I’m ready to go deeper — and I need you.

About Me

  • 25 y.o.

  • 🇷🇺 Born on an island in the Pacific (Russia), now in SF

  • 🧠 Thiel Fellow

  • 💰 Sold 2 startups — scaled the last to $4M ARR, $3M raised, acquired by Toptal

  • 💻 Built the first Omi prototypes (hardware, mobile)

  • 💸 Raised $5M+ total

  • 🧲 Managed teams across 3 continents

  • 📈 Drove 100M+ organic impressions for Omi

Check me out at nikshevchenko.com

What You’ll Do

As the first engineer, you’ll:

  • Own the full stack (Flutter/React Native, Python, firmware, BLE, backend, etc — depending on what you’re best at)

  • Architect the next version of Omi SDK / platform / hardware control

  • Build prototypes that feel like magic and scale into products

  • Help shape product direction, technical stack, and even culture

  • Work directly with me every day — we’ll build and launch together

This is not a “here’s what to do” job — this is “what should we do next?”

What I’m Looking For

Someone who’s built and shipped something impressive. For example:

  • Built a product used by 1M+ people or 10K+ devices shipped

  • Or built something with >$1M revenue

  • Or raised >$1M as a founder / solo builder

  • Or deeply technical + insanely fast — even if early in your journey

You don’t need to check every box — but one really strong signal is enough.

Tech Stack (so far)

  • Flutter (might move to React soon)

  • Python / Flask

  • Firmware: C

  • BLE

  • Omi DevKit (custom hardware)

Why This Might Be the One

  • You’ll get lots of equity and full ownership over technical direction

  • Work on actual AI hardware, not just apps

  • Build something that people already love — and want more of

  • Help people think and live better with ambient, embodied AI

Let’s make humans 1000x smarter with AI by 2026.
Let’s make robots help in every apartment by 2028.
Let's create the metaverse

II personally check every candidate!
If I didn’t respond, something was off. 🥲

jobs.title: Founding Manufacturing Lead
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Omi

We wire humans into AI. Our audio necklace is already shipping; smart-glasses with an on-device brain-interface come next. Demand isn’t the problem—output is. We need a builder who lives for factory output, supplier pings at 3 a.m., and the smell of working 3D printers

What you’ll do

  • Run a factory in SF

  • Hit the numbers

    • Q3: 5 000 Omi units in the U.S.

    • Q4: ramp to 30 k; 2026 target: 200 k.

  • Source every component—Li-Po, PCBs, plastics

  • China push trips when a supplier needs a face on the line.

  • Build the team: recruit techs, SMT operators, incoming-QC contractors.

You’re right for this if

  • You’ve taken at least one consumer product to ≥1 000 shipped units (wearable, IoT, CE, robotics—volume matters).

  • Can read a BOM and know the broker who’ll overnight the hard-to-find part.

  • Comfortable leading line techs on Monday and hand-soldering rework on Tuesday.

  • Thrive in a 6-day, in-person startup shop; get restless without high throughput.

Compensation

  • 1 % – 5 % equity — real eight-figure upside on exit

  • $100 k – $200 k salary (experience-indexed)

  • Free housing, food, and 24/7 warehouse lab access

Why Omi

  • Units already sell out; your work is the growth gate.

  • Zero bureaucracy: you’re the first ops lead—total ownership.

  • Next challenge after necklace: smart-glasses with BCI—hardware history in the making.

jobs.title: Growth Intern / Video maker
jobs.descriptionHtml:
What we build:

  • Omi Necklace — records every word you say or hear

  • Omi Glass — same idea, plus camera and live AI help

Mission: make omi grow

What you’ll do

  • Make one horizontal video every week

  • Post 2 TikTok/Shorts every day

  • Come up with ideas that move sales and make them real

  • No hand-holding: if an idea works, double down; if it flops, drop it and try another

Who gets in

  • Send one thing that proves you’re good (video, project link, screenshot—anything)

  • You can live and work in San Francisco all summer

  • You’re someone we’d still enjoy hanging with at 2 a.m. during all-nighters

jobs.title: General Application
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Omi, we are building AI wearables that make you 1,000x more productive. Our vision is to enhance human intelligence by giving people perfect memory and instant access to knowledge.

Omi is a wearable AI device that records what you hear, transcribes conversations, summarizes key points, and proactively assists with tasks. Whether you're in back-to-back meetings, brainstorming ideas, or having deep discussions, Omi ensures you never miss anything important.

The product we have today is just the beginning. We’ve shipped multiple hardware iterations, built a developer ecosystem with 250+ apps — all in under a year.

Why Omi? 👀

Joining Omi means shaping the future of AI hardware. Our team is lean, fast, and ambitious—everyone has a massive impact. The work you do will not only drive our company forward but redefine how people interact with AI in their daily lives.

We believe the future isn’t about replacing human intelligence—it’s about augmenting it. If you want to help build the next breakthrough in AI wearables, come join us

Benefits 💯

  • Relocation: If you are outside of the United States, we will help you get into the US

  • Top-of-market compensation: we strive to offer top-of-market salary and equity.

  • Employee-friendly equity terms: we offer an extended exercise window and early exercise for any options offered.

  • Sell equity along the way: Unlike most startups, we don’t believe in holding you captive with golden handcuffs. When there are opportunities for you to sell a portion of your vested stock, we offer them.

  • Quarterly retreats: we have offsites quarterly to bring everyone together. Hawaii, Thailand and more!

jobs.title: CMO
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Omi makes AI wearables that record and think with you.
10 000 units shipped, new dev-glasses live, factory slot booked.
Next stop: 100 000 units out the door and 30 000 site views a day.

We need someone who can turn that into reality—fast.

What you’ll own

  • Daily traffic: take us from 5 k → 50 k sessions by end of Q4.(~6M social media views per day, 180M views per month)

  • Unit sales: 100 k necklaces sold in 2025

  • UGC Creator army: recruit, onboard, and manage 100+ in-house short-form creators; four fresh clips live every day.

  • Influencers/Ambassadors: recruit, onboard, and manage experienced creators

  • Inhouse content: manage the team that produces inhouse content

  • Team: hire, coach, and keep a lean crew of editors, growth PMs, and UGC shooters.

What you’ve done

  • You have 20K+ followers on socials yourself

  • Scaled a company to 100M+ views on at least one channel for a brand.

  • Closed creator and brand deals that actually moved product, not just vanity likes.

  • Bonus: launched something viral in the last 12 months.

How we’ll measure you

  1. Site sessions/day

  2. Units sold/week

  3. Cost per purchase

What you get

  • $120-200 k cash + 5-20 % equity

  • Budget to hire and spend

  • Live/work in San Francisco with a team that’s awake at 2 a.m. soldering and filming.
